list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short, slender, sharp-pointed metal pin with a raised helical thread running around it and a slotted head, used to join things together by being rotated so that it pierces wood or other material and is held tightly in place.
an act of turning a screw or other object having a thread.
a prisoner's derogatory term for a prison guard or warden.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was frightened by the look of the screws
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô sợ hãi bởi vẻ ngoài của các ốc vít

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fasten or tighten with a screw or screws.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: screw the hinge to your new door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vít bản lề vào cửa mới của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cheat or swindle (someone), especially by charging them too much for something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if you do what they tell you, you're screwed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu bạn làm những gì họ nói với bạn, bạn đang bị lừa
